library("methylKit")
test_files = list() control_files = list()
test_ids = list() control_ids = list()
#for $i, $s in enumerate( $test_series ) test_ids[${i}] = past("test", ${i}, sep="") test_files[${i}] = "${s.input.file_name}" #end for
#for $i, $s in enumerate( $control_series ) control_ids[${i}] = past("control", ${i}, sep="") control_files[${i}] = "${s.input.file_name}" #end for
sample_ids = append(test_ids, control_ids) treatment_tag = c(rep.int(1, length(test_ids)), rep.int(0, length(control_ids)))
myobj=methRead( file.list, sample.id=sample_ids,assembly="hg18",pipeline="amp",treatment=treatment_tag)
## unite function methidh=unite(myobj)
#if $choice in ["all", "differential_methylation"]: diffMethPerChr(myDiff,plot=FALSE,qvalue.cutoff=0.01, meth.cutoff=25)
bedgraph(myDiff, file.name="output.bed", col.name="meth.diff", unmeth=FALSE,log.transform=FALSE,negative=FALSE,add.on="")
hypo = getMethylDiff(myDiff,difference=25,qvalue=0.01,type="hypo") hyper = getMethylDiff(myDiff,difference=25,qvalue=0.01,type="hyper")
bedgraph(hyper, file.name="output_hyper.bed", col.name="meth.diff", unmeth=FALSE,log.transform=FALSE,negative=FALSE,add.on="") bedgraph(hypo, file.name="output_hypo.bed", col.name="meth.diff", unmeth=FALSE,log.transform=FALSE,negative=FALSE,add.on="") #end if

pdf( "output_PCA.pdf" ) PCASamples(methidh) devname = dev.off() #end if

## methseg generates Granges segRaw = methSeg(tileRaw,diagnostic.plot = FALSE) segDiff = methSeg(tileDiff,diagnostic.plot = FALSE)
